actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide increased penalties for illegal distributions of controlled substances in or adjacent to elementary and secondary schools.

summary.text: Amends the Controlled Substances Act to impose special penalties for illegal distribution of controlled substances in or adjacent to elementary and secondary schools.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Controlled Substances Act to provide increased penalties for illegal distributions of controlled substances in or adjacent to elementary and secondary schools.
